snippet.title: Blade Prince Academy - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2333510/Blade_Prince_Academy/?utm_source=&utm_medium=Youtube&utm_campaign=release&utm_content=releasetrailer

Blade Prince Academy is a modern take on the tactical RPG genre! Explore the city of Abjectalia in this dark fantasy and anime-inspired world. Countless battles await you to unsolve the mysteries behind the Academy. The dynamic and deep tactical real-time with pause feature lets you adapt to every situation, focus on timing and combos to take down your enemies! 

Blade Prince Academy social media:
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vsxD6n8P8J
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/bpagame
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bladeprinceacademy
- Newsletter: https://bit.ly/bpanewsletter

Voice Over: Sammi Price 
Music: Dishonored by Chris Phaze
Sound design: Valentin Frin

Developed by Angel Corp and published by Firesquid
